name: openfort-react
description: The easiest way to integrate Openfort to your project.

scripts.build: node build.js && yarn workspace @openfort/react run build && cp README.md packages/openfort-react/README.md
scripts.build:cra: yarn build && yarn workspace cra build
scripts.build:nextjs: yarn build && yarn workspace nextjs build
scripts.build:firebase: yarn build && yarn workspace firebase build
scripts.build:headless: yarn build && yarn workspace headless build
scripts.build:nextjs-app: yarn build && yarn workspace nextjs-app build
scripts.build:playground: yarn build && yarn workspace playground build
